Amie requires a loan in order to buy men's and women's clothing. She hopes that the extra income she will earn with the help of this loan will allow her to increase her business and improve her standard of living. In the future; Amie plans to own a big shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's clothing.

loans.name: Kham

texts.en:
Kham, aged 35, is a hardworking father who owns and manages a rice farming business in Kampong Thom province to support his family. He is also in the business of sourcing and purchasing hair. He has four school-aged children whom he loves very much and who encourage him and his wife to work tirelessly to provide a better quality of life and education. Despite his hardships, he is able to make a net profit of KHR 20,000 per day.

Kham wants to establish a sustainable business and ensure a stable income. Due to insufficient capital, he has applied for a loan of KHR 1,500,000 to invest in a hair-purchasing business. With the support of this loan, he believes that he will be able to move forward in his business. He thanks the lenders for their support.

loans.use: to invest in a hair-purchasing business.

loans.name: Math

texts.en:
Math is a vendor living in Reussey Keo district, an area of Phnom Penh. She earns a living by buying used clothes in bulk and selling them to the people who visit the market where she rents a space for her business. She usually earns a net profit of about $4.80 per day.

Math has asked for a loan of US $500 to buy more clothes in different styles to satisfy her customers. She is very thankful for the loan support, which she hopes will allow her to increase her sales and thereby earn additional income.

loans.use: to buy more clothes of different styles to satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Ong

texts.en:
To earn a living, Ong and her husband work together to manage their farm lots, where they plant rice and beans. They have been farmers for years, and each of them usually earns a net profit of KHR 9,000 per day. They want to increase their yields and income to pay for the necessities of life and support the education of their children.

Ong is requesting a loan of KHR 1,000,000 to prepare the land and buy farm inputs to expand their bean production. She and her husband believe that they will be able to increase their yields and income through their patience and hard work.

loans.use: to prepare the land and buy farm inputs to expand her bean production.

loans.name: Rugiatu

texts.en:
Meet 40-year-old Rugiatu from Tombo, in the Western Area Rural District of Sierra Leone, near Freetown. She is married with three children aged three to 20 years old. One of her children is going to school. 

After the war, Rugiatu established her clothing business. She began her business because she needed to create income to support the home. She works at the business 10 hours per day, seven days per week. She says the main challenge to her business is a lack of capital to run her business.

Rugiatu requires a loan to buy different kinds of male and female clothing for resale. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and improve her standard of living. 

In the future, Rugiatu plans to own a big shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of male and female clothing for resale.

loans.name: Isha

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 45-year-old Isha from Tombo, in the Western Area Rural District, near Freetown. She is married and blessed with three children between the ages of 12 and 27 years old. Two of her children attend school. 

Isha runs a cookery business at home. She sells vegetable soup and fufu (made from cassava grain) from her house. She has been running this business since after the war. She works at it throughout the week, from morning to night. She says the main challenges to her business are price inflation and insufficient finances to expand.

Isha has requested a loan to buy more cooking items, like rice, palm oil and seasonings. The extra income from this loan will enalbe her to educate her children and increase her business. 

In the future, she plans to expand her business more. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more cooking items, such as rice, palm oil and seasonings.

loans.name: Om

texts.en:
To be successful in her career and in life are the goals of Om, a married woman with two children. Om is 34 years old, and she works as a rice farmer in Kampong Cham province. Despite her financial constraints, she is determined to improve her standard of living and give her children a bright future. Her husband, in addition to supporting her farming activities, works as a construction laborer to earn a daily wage.

Om and her husband aim to build their own home and to provide their children with good living conditions. Due to insufficient capital, she has requested a loan of US $1,500 to buy the materials needed for the construction of a suitable home for the family. Om thanks Kiva lenders for their constant support.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for the construction of her home.

loans.name: So

texts.en:
So is 45 years old. She is the single mother of an adult child.  She is raising her family alone in a village of Prey Chor district, Kampong Cham province. She plants and harvests rice and seasonal crops, which she sells in order to provide the basic necessities for the family. She has been in this business for almost 30 years.

Due to financial constraints, So has applied for a loan in the amount of KHR 800,000 in order to buy fertilizers and pesticides to ensure healthy rice. She believes that this loan will enable her to achieve her plans and hopes that she will have a fruitful harvest in the coming season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides to ensure healthy rice.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es: Abel de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 14 y 12 años de edad y uno de 7 meses, el se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de frijol y maíz, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Abel está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, etc. para poder seguir con sus cultivos y obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Abel is 45 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and three children, aged 12 and 14 years old and a little one, 7 months old. For the past 10 years he has been a farmer, especially planting beans and corn. What he obtains from his sales goes towards paying the household expenses.

Abel is requesting this loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest controls, etc. so he can continue growing his crops. He wants to make more money to give his family what they need, without limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest controls, etc.

loans.name: Soknov

texts.en:
Soknov is 58 years old and married. She is a resident of Battambang province. To endure her family’s hardships, she raises rice and corn as her primary source of income. She has been farming for more than 10 years and is able to earn about 36,000 KHR per day. 

Soknov is in her her third loan cycle with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She has repaid her previous loans, which she used wisely to improve her business as well as her living conditions. She is now seeking a loan of 1,400,000 KHR in order to buy fertilizer, potash, and corn seed and to pay for labor costs. She hopes that she will have a good yield from her cash crop, which she hopes will be better than last year to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, potash, and corn seed and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en:
Isatu is 35 years old and married with three children between the ages of five and 12 years old. She runs a domestic product business in Tombo, in the western rural area of Sierra Leone.

She has been in this business since 2007. She sells pots and pans and different types of food containers within her community. She says the main problem for her business is that, sometimes, purchasing power is very slow. 

Isatu has requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale. She says the extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and attain a permanent business location. 

In the future, she would like to open a big shop. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale.

loans.name: Nop

texts.en:
Nop is a responsible mother who aims to uplift her family's standard of living to give them a better life. She is 58 years old and has eight children: four married children and four single children. She and her spouse are raising their family in a peaceful village of Kampong Cham province. The couple cultivates about 1.5 hectares of farmland on which they produce seasonal rice crops. They have been in this occupation since 1979, when the Cambodian people were released from Pol Pot's regime.

Nop wants to acquire a loan of KHR 300,000 to pay for labor costs incurred in plowing her rice paddy. She believes that, through this loan, she will be able to make her business profitable. Through her perseverance in the face of hardships, she is confident that she will become successful someday.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs incurred in plowing her rice paddy.

loans.name: Saren's Group

texts.en:
Saren, a resident of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, is 31 years old and a widow who has one little kid to care for. As a single mother raising her son alone, she runs a small grocery stall and grows vegetables to generate income. She has been engaged in her current business for five years. 

Saren has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for ages. With the positive impacts of her previous loans, Saren has been able to support her family, providing three decent meals for her child each day. She has teamed up with two other borrowers to apply for the current loan. Her three-person group is seeking a loan of 500,000 KHR. As her team's leader, she will use her portion of the loan to buy insecticide for her crop. She hopes that she can minimize losses due to pests and increase the yield from her vegetable garden.

loans.use: To buy insecticide for her crop

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 45-year-old Fatmata from Tombo, in the Western Area Rural District, near Freetown. She is married and blessed with three children between the ages of 13 and 28 years old. 

Fatmata runs a cookery business at home; she sells food from her house. She has been running this business since after the war. She started it to get the family's daily feeding from her cookery sales. 

She works at the business throughout the week, from morning to night. Fatmata says the main challenges for her business are price inflation and insufficient finances to expand.

Fatmata has requested a loan to buy more cooking items, such as rice, palm oil and seasonings. The extra income from this loan will enable her to educate her children and increase her business. 

In the future, she plans to build a house. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more cooking items, such as rice, palm oil and seasonings.

loans.name: Savong's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Savong is 39 years old and a married mother. She deals with daily food consumption via cassava farming and working as paid-worker, which she has been involved in for 20 years. 

This is the fifth loan for Savong with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). After the successful past loans, which she has fully repaid back, she feels confident that she can keep improving her lifestyle better than before. 

For this cycle, she joins a group of three to get a new loan again. She and one of her joint borrower are seeking 1,000,000 KHR each, while a remaining member is applying for 500,000 KHR. 

As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her cassava. She hopes that she can double her yield and make a good profit to better off her living condition.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her cassava.

loans.name: Samphors' Group

texts.en:
Samphors is a young mother of one little son. She is 26 years old and resides in the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province. To earn a living, she works for others for a fee while her husband works at a local company. She has been involved in this occupation for several years, and she earns about 33,000 KHR per day. 

This is Samphors's first microloan through VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She has formed a three-person group to apply for a loan. As the team leader, she will use her portion of the loan to buy necessary household appliances for her family. She hopes that she can keep improving her living conditions and earn a good profit so that she can send her kid to school.

loans.use: To buy necessary household appliances for her family

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 41 que vive junto a su esposa Antonia y sus 4 hijos en su casa construida con bloques de adobe. Creció en el campo junto a sus padres quienes le enseñaron el oficio de la agricultura y esto le sirvió para que años después lo desempeñe en beneficio de su propia familia. Posee un terreno de 3 hectáreas muy fértil que le permite producir cacao orgánico y otros productos rentables de su zona con ayuda de su esposa e hijos. Se siente muy a gusto con su labor ya que le agradada realizar sus labores en el campo al aire libre y sin presiones de por medio logrando obtener sus ganancias cada fin de campaña. Suele contratar trabajadores del lugar que lo apoyan en tareas complicadas tales como el retiro de maleza entre sus plantaciones y corte de tallos defectuosos que favorecen la obtención de una calidad comercial de sus productos. Muy aparte de producir cacao posee también varios árboles frutales como plátanos, naranjas y mangos que vende los fines de semana en la feria de su distrito a fin de obtener ganancias adicionales.
Se caracteriza por ser muy responsable y alistar todo lo necesario para desempeñar cada campaña productiva con la compra de abono orgánico. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante. En esta oportunidad desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico para seguir fertilizando sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 41-year-old man who lives with his wife Antonia and their four children in their home made of adobe. Jorge grew up in the countryside with his parents who taught him the ropes in being a farmer and this helped him so that is the years to come he could carry out this role for the benefit of his family. He owns a very fertile plot of land of 3 hectares on which he grows organic cacao and other profitable products from his region with the help of his wife and children.

Jorge feels very much at ease with his work as he likes working in the fields in the open air without any pressures of the fear of earning a profit at the end of each harvest. He usually hires workers from the area who help him with complex tasks such as clearing weeds from amongst the plantations and cutting sick branches to improve the commercial quality of his products. As well producing cacao, he also owns several fruit trees such as banana trees, orange trees and mango trees which he sells on the weekends at the local market in his area in order to gain additional income.

Jorge describes himself as being very responsible and preparing everything for each production cycle with the purchase of organic fertilizer. This is his first loan with Kiva and he feels very grateful for the financial support that he is receiving to get ahead in life. At this moment in time, he is seeking 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles to buy organic fertilizer to continue fertilizing his fields.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Saroeun's Group

texts.en:
Saroeun is a 35-year-old mother of one little daughter and a resident from Battambang province where rice farming is the most popular business in a local area. Saroeun also does this business to support her living. 

She manages one hectare of rice farming with the support from her husband. During the free time, her husband also works for others for a fee to supplement the family’s income. Engaging in current business for 10 years, she is able to earn almost 37,000 KHR per day. 

Saroeun and other co-borrowers are new to VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). They are seeking the same loan amount of 100,000 KHR each. As the leader, Saroeun will spend her loan portion to buy herbicide for her farmland. She hopes she can make more money from her agribusiness so that she can set aside some money for her children for future need.

loans.use: to buy herbicide for her farmland.

loans.name: Sokhoeub's Group

texts.en:
Sokhoeub , age 31, is a citizen originally from Battambang province. She has two children to look after as they are still in school. Nowadays, the main source of income for her family is from working for others for a fee. She has been involved in her current occupation for several years. 

This is the the fourth loan for Sokhoeub with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loans with success to stabilize her lifestyle in gradual pace. 

Now, in a group of three, she is the leader. She will spend her loan portion to renovate her house towards a good condition. She hopes that this loan will enable her to fix her house in time so she does not need to worry about the upcoming rainy season at all.

loans.use: to renovate her house in time before the upcoming rainy season.

loans.name: Sokhoeun's Group

texts.en:
Sokhoeun is 27 years old and the married mother of two children, one schoolchild and one little kid. To sustain her family, she and her husband grow rice as their main source of income. They also supplement their income by selling grocery items. Sokhoeun has been in this business for 7 years, earning about 31,000 KHR per day. 

This is the fifth loan for Sokhoeun and third loan for her co-borrower through VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Sokhoeun has repaid her previous loans, which have allowed her to improve her standard of living. For this cycle, she is the leader of her borrower team. She will spend her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and insecticide and to pay for labor costs. She hopes that she can gain a good yield from her business and earn more income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Chanthy's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Chanthy is married and blessed with three children. Currently, only two of her children are still dependents as they are in school. To tackle the family’s financial burden, Chanthy is running a small food stall as her main source of income. 

This is not Chanthy's first microloan through VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Her previous loans have enabled her to support her business on time and keep her children in school. For this cycle, she has formed a two-person group to apply for a new loan. As the leader of her team, she will spend her portion of the loan to buy more ingredients to make porridge to sell. She hopes to gain a good income and keep her children in school until the tertiary level.

loans.use: To buy more food ingredients to make porridge

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida que se dedica a la albañilería, y sus 2 hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de frijol y maíz desde hace cinco años, es una persona responsable, honesta, trabajadora y muy dedicada en sus labores, de esta manera ha logrado sacar a su familia adelante, la clienta solicita un crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas para continuar con el cultivo como semillas, abono, fertilizantes, herramientas etc. Para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: The customer lives in her own home with her life partner, who makes his living as a builder, and their two children. She has been making her living grown corn and beans for the last five years. She is a responsible, honest, hardworking and very dedicated person when it comes to her work. It is in this manner that she has managed to get her family ahead in life. The customer is seeking a loan to buy agricultural supplies to continue the crop such as seeds, manure, fertilizers, tools and so on to grow her income and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, tools and so on.

loans.name: Noeurn's Group

texts.en:
Noeurn is 42 years old and a resident of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She has eight children, but only five of them are dependents. To struggle for a living, she farms rice on a 1.5-hectare plot and works for others to earn extra income. She has been involved in her current business for 10 years, and she is able to earn 30,600 KHR per day. 

This is not Noeurn's first loan through VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her previous loans, which allowed her to upgrade her living conditions. As the leader of her two-person group, she will spend her portion of the loan on fertilizer, insecticide, and labor costs. She hopes that she can double the yield from her crop and make more income than last year.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Huon's Group

texts.en: Huon is a 34-year-old rice farmer residing in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She has three children to care for as they are still in school. She has managed her two hectares of wet-season rice for 10 years. Huon’s previous loan was her first loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid her previous loan, which enabled her to improve her living conditions. For this cycle, she has formed a three-person group to apply for a new loan. As the leader of her group, she will spend her portion of the loan on fertilizer, herbicide, and labor costs for her farmland. She hopes that she can make more income from her crop.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicide and to pay labor costs for her farmland

loans.name: Saret's Group

texts.en: Saret, an inhabitant of the Moung Russey District of Battambang Province, is 27 years old and a married mother blessed with two schoolchildren. She manages seven hectares of rice farming as their main source of income, which she has been occupied with for seven years. Including this loan, she is a third-time borrower, and her co-borrower is a second-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Her past loans, which she has completely repaid, have enabled her to upgrade her lifestyle. Now, she and her joint borrower are seeking the same loan amount of 1,000,000 riels (KHR) each. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and herbicide for her crop. She hopes to gain a good yield from her crop and sell it at a high price so she can gain better income than last year.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicide for her crop

loans.name: Srey

texts.en:
A mother of one schoolchild residing in Kampong Cham province, Srey is 44 years old and struggles for a living via rice farming on two hectares area. This business returns her about 33,000 KHR per day. 

With this loan, she is the first-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is seeking 2,000,000 KHR in order to buy fertilizer and to pay for transplanting fee for her crop. She hopes that she can support her cash-crop on time and gain triple yield with a good selling price.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for transplanting fees for her crop.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sokhon

texts.en:
Sokhon is 27 years old and a married lady residing in Sa Ang district of Kandal province. The main sources of her family income are mango plantation, bean farming, and factory work. She has been in this business for several years. 

Never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before, Sokhon is seeking her first loan in order to buy insecticide for her mango and pay for labor cost. She hopes that she can make more income than before and improve her lifestyle at a gradual pace.

loans.use: to buy insecticide for her mango and pay for labor cost.

loans.name: Juan Alejandro Lazaro

texts.es: Don Juan es un hombre ya mayor, tiene 66 años; sin embargo, también es muy trabajador y responsable, pero sobretodo un gran emprendedor. Está casado con la señora Bertha desde hace 48 años y juntos formaron una gran familia con 12 hijos: cinco mujeres y siete hombres, todos ellos ya son independientes. Don Juan se dedica a la venta de pinturas y de desperdicios industriales como tambos de plástico, de metal, cartón, etc. Formalmente lleva apenas tres años en esta activodad, pero toda su vida se ha dedicado a vender todo tipo de materiales. Inició a vender mercancía de desperdicio porque firmó un contrato con una fábrica y así poder comprar botes de pintura. Don Juan le vende a varias ferreterías alrededor de su municipio. Está solicitando un crédito para poder pagar su pedido de botes de pinturas y además porque necesita pagarle a la fabrica para poder levvarse su mercancía que necesita entregar en cuanto antes a sus clientes pues ya tiene muchos pedidos y clientes seguros. “Mi única dificultad es la falta de dinero para poder invertir en mi negocio". A pesar de este reto, Don Juan desea seguir adelante con su negocio porque su meta es poder surtir de todos los colores “No me gusta cuando mis clientes tienen que regresar sin lo que buscaban”. Don Juan está muy contento y agradecido con la institución por la oportunidad de recibir un crédito.
texts.en:
Juan is no longer young at 66 years old. However he is also very hard-working, responsible and moreover a great entrepreneur. He has been married to Bertha for 48 years and together they form a large family with 12 children. Five of them are female, seven male. They are all independent now. 

Juan sells paint and industrial waste materials like plastic, metal and cardboard barrels. Formally he has been in this business for 3 years, but he has been selling all kinds of materials his whole life. He started to sell waste materials when he signed a contract with a factory to buy cans of paint. Juan sells them to various hardware stores around his municipality.

Juan is requesting this loan to be able to pay for his order of cans of paint. He has to pay the factory before he can take his merchandise. He needs to get it to his clients as soon as possible as he has lots of orders and loyal customers.

" My only difficulty is not having enough money to invest in my business". Despite this challenge Juan wants to continue on with his business. His goal is to stock all the colors. "I don't like it when clients go away without what they want". Juan is very happy and grateful for the opportunity to get a loan from VisionFund.

loans.use: to buy cans of paint.

loans.name: Savuth

texts.en:
Savuth is 42 years old and one of the breadwinners in a family consisting of three dependent children who are still in school. To earn a living, she grows rice, while her husband works at a construction site. For her, she has been involved in rice farming for more than 10 years.

This is her first loan from Savuth VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). For this cycle, she will spend her loan portion to support her rice farming and build a water well for her family as well as her rice farm. She hopes this loan will help her supply water for usage for her family in a timely manner.

loans.use: to support her rice farming and build a well for her family and her rice farm.

loans.name: Victoria Alejandra

texts.es:
Victoria tiene 34 años de edad es una mujer con muchas fuerzas, muchos sueños la cual se gradúo de bachiller en computación y es madre soltera de 2 hijos. Ella se dedica a la agricultura siendo su especialidad la siembra y cultivo de café, sus 2 hijos uno de ocho años que está en cuarto grado y otro de 12 años que está en sexto grado estudian en la escuela viviendo en su casa solo ellos tres. Ella se dedica a la agricultura hace más de 5 años aprendió a trabajar en este rubro gracias a su ex esposo que ha sido agricultor de toda la vida. Su actividad económica a parte del cultivo y siembra de café es también la venta de golosinas y sus tierras las adquirió por compra. Sus desafíos son la baja de precios y las fuertes lluvias (factor clima) ya que en este rubro la competencia no es factor problema la cual está ubicada a una distancia de 3 kilómetros de su casa de habitación al cual viaja en bus y solo se involucra ella.
 
Sus planes a futuro como madre es seguir invirtiendo en sus cultivos de café para que sean más productivas cada año y así darle una mejor calidad de vida sus hijos. Su sueño es comprar más áreas de terreno para seguir cultivando ya que su meta es invertir las ganancias en el mismo rubro. Victoria Actualmente ha solicitado un financiamiento para la compra de fertilizantes los cuales son necesarios para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
Victoria is a 34 year old woman of many strengths and many dreams, one of which is that she graduated with a degree in information technology, and that she is a single mother of two children. She is farming, her specialty being the planting and harvesting of coffee. Her two children -- one 8 years old and in the fourth grade, the other 12 years old and in the sixth grade -- study at school and live at home. It is just the three of them in the house. 

Victoria has been doing agriculture for more than 5 years. She learned to work in this area thanks to her ex-husband who has been a farmer all of his life. Besides harvesting and planting coffee, Victoria's business is selling candy and pieces of land that she has acquired. 

Victoria's challenges are the lowering of prices and heavy rainfall (a climate factor). Competition in this area is not a problem, as it is located 3 kilometers from her home, where the bus travels and only involves her. 

Her future plan as a mother is to keep investing in her coffee crops so that they become more productive each year, and in this way give her children a better quality of life. Her dream is to buy more land and keep farming since her goal is to invest the earnings in the same area. Currently Victoria is requesting financing for the purchase of fertilizers that are necessary for maintaining her coffee crops.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers, manure, and coffee plant formula among other needs for the coffee crops.

loans.name: Eligeizer

texts.es: Eligeizer, a sus 25 años de edad, es padre de un hijo de 2 años y vive en unión libre con su pareja. Desde joven aprendió las labores del campo, gracias a que es una tradición familiar que ha pasado de generación en generación. Actualmente se dedica a la cría de pollos y cerdos, pues tiene un galpón y una  marranera donde tiene una cerda de cría y lechones; los ingresos que recibe son los que genera con la comercialización de los animales. El cliente ha pasado por muchas dificultades en los últimos años, pues su esposa tuvo complicaciones con el embarazo y al mismo tiempo se quedó sin empleo, lo que generó una crisis económica en su hogar; sin embargo supo sobrellevar la situación y poco a poco ha ido superando estas adversidades. Actualmente solicita el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de lechones, pollos para cría y engorde y el concentrado para los animales, aumentando de esta forma su producción, pues se aproxima la temporada navideña en la que el precio de venta de estos animales se puede incrementar, mejorando notablemente el margen de ganancias. Eligeizer desea seguir trabajando con esfuerzo, disciplina y dedicación para lograr que su negocio crezca y sea cada día más rentable, que le permita tener una estabilidad económica favorable para dar a su hijo una excelente educación y mejorar el bienestar y las condiciones de vida de su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Eligeizer, at his 25 years of age, has a two year old son.  He lives in a common-law marriage with his life partner.  When he was a young man he learned field work, thanks to this being a family tradition passed on from generation to generation.

He currently raises chickens and pigs.  He has a shed and a pig pen where he raises pigs and piglets.  The income that he gets is what is generated from selling the animals.  

Eligeizer has experienced many difficulties in the last few years.  His wife had complications with the pregnancy, and he was left without employment at the same time.  This created a financial crisis in his household.  Nevertheless, he knew how to cope with the situation.  Little by little he has been overcoming these adversities.

He is currently requesting the loan to buy piglets and chickens to raise and fatten and to buy concentrated feed for the animals.  This way he will be increasing his production.  Christmas season is approaching, and the sales price for these animals is able to increase.  This will notably improve his profit margin.

Eligeizer wishes to continue working with effort, discipline, and dedication in order to manage to make his business grow and so that it will be more and more profitable each day.  He will do this so that it allows him to have favorable financial security in order to give his son an excellent education.  He will also do this in order to improve his family’s well-being and their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy piglets and chickens to raise and fatten and to buy concentrated feed for the animals.

loans.name: Ernesto Armando

texts.es: Ernesto de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz y a la crianza de ganado de engorde y lechero desde hace varios años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por la amabilidad y buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, don Ernesto está solicitando un prestamos para poder comprar otra vaca lechera ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder comprarla y así poder seguir con su producción de leche y queso y obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto a su esposa.
texts.en:
Ernesto is 60 years old and lives in his own home with his spouse. He has worked for a number of years growing corn and raising livestock, both to fatten up and for dairy. He sells his products in the different markets close to his home. He has a large clientele thanks to his friendliness and good prices. He is able to pay for some of his household's expenses with his earnings. 

Ernesto is requesting this loan to buy another dairy cow, since he's not able to buy one with his current income. With a new cow, he will be able to continue producing milk and cheese, make a better income, and have a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: to buy another dairy cow.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis de 60 años de edad, esta acompañado, tiene cuatro hijos todos mayores de edad e independientes, Debido a que su familia era de pocos recurso, solo estudio hasta tercer grado. Su esposa es la única que vive con y se dedica  los oficios de la casa.

Su trabajo es ser agricultor, desde los diez años trabajo con su padre y aprendio tde él todo lo que sabe hoy en dia. Luis se levante a las 5 de la mañana para ir a trabajar, el lugar de trabajo esta a 5 minutos apie desde siu casa; a diario trabaja 5 horas seguidas y luego regresa a su casa.

El préstamo sera utilizado en comprar un par de bueyes para trabajar la tierra y también para trasladar la cosecha desde el lugar de siembra hasta donde permanecerá guardada.

Luis tiene planeado construir una carreta para trabajar con sus bueyes y no pagar particular para hacer su trabajo, también planea ofrecer sus servicio de arado con sus animales para tener un ingreso mas en la familia. Quiere también comprar una vaca para empezar un lote de producción de leche.
texts.en:
Luis, age 60, is married and has four grown and independent children.  Due to the fact that his family had few resources, he only went to school up until the third grade.  His wife is the only one he lives with, and she devotes herself to the household chores.

He is a farmer.  Starting at age ten, he worked with his father and learned all that he now knows.  Luis gets up at five in the morning in order to go to work.  The place where he works is five minutes by foot from his house.  He works five consecutive hours, and he then returns home.

The loan will be used to buy a pair of oxen to work the land and to transport the harvest from the place where it is grown to where it will be kept.

Luis plans to build a cart in order to work with his oxen and not pay a private individual to do the work.  He also plans to offer plowing services with his animals in order to have more income for his family.  He also wants to buy a cow in order to start a batch of milk production.

loans.use: to buy a pair of oxen.

loans.name: Angel De Mayo Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres comerciantes luchadoras  una de ellas es Esperanza tiene 45 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de comida desde hace 5 años. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como tortillas, carne de res, carne de pollo, para la elaboración de tacos, enchiladas y compra de gaseosa al por mayor. Ana  mujer de 39 años su negocio es la venta de calzado y cosméticos Avon y Rosalina tiene 49 años, su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three determined businesswomen. One of them is Esperanza. She is 45 years old and married with two children. For 5 years, her business has been selling food. She needs the loan to buy raw materials such as tortillas, beef, and chicken to make tacos and enchiladas and to buy wholesale soft drinks. 

Ana is 39 and her business is selling shoes and Avon cosmetics. Rosalina is 49 years old and her business is a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as tortillas, beef, and chicken to make tacos and enchiladas and to buy wholesale soft drinks

loans.name: Delfina Marleny

texts.es: Doña Delfina de  31 años vive en casa propia  junto a su esposo  y sus tres  hijos,  ella se dedica  a la elaboración  y venta  de hamacas  desde hace 8años,  es una persona  muy responsable   con lo que obtiene de su trabajo  logra solventar algunas de las necesidades  del hogar, doña delfina solicita un crédito con el cual  tiene pensado  realizar la compra de materiales  como: hilos de colores, lanas, yersi, etc. con esto  poder aumentar  su producción y sus ingresos y poder alcanzar una mejor  calidad  de vida.
texts.en:
Delfina is 31 years old and lives in her own home with her spouse and their three children. She has been making and selling hammocks for eight years. She is a very responsible person. With her earnings from work, she manages to pay for some household necessities. 

Delfina is requesting a loan, which she plans to use to buy materials like colored threads, wool, cotton jersey, etc. This way, she will be able to increase her production and her earnings, and achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy colored thread, wool, and cotton jersey.

loans.name: Orquídeas Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Orquídeas” se encuentra en una comunidad muy tranquila, las personas de dicha comunidad se dedican a la siembra de maíz el cual sirve como para alimento de todo un año. Los integrantes decidieron el nombre porque la casa donde se reunían había una maceta con una orquídea muy bonita y llamativa. Los integrantes del grupo son Celinda ella está solicitando su crédito para invertir en novedades y juguetes, Don Joaquín invertirá en la cría engorda y venta de borregos, Doña Carmen y Regina invertirán en la cría, engorda y venta de pollos, Doña Agustina y Ana Karen invertirán en sus tiendas de abarrotes. 

Doña Alicia o Ali, quien es la representante del grupo, tiene 57 años de edad está casada con el señor Gustavo y juntos formaron una familia con tres hijos. Doña  Ali se dedica  a la cría, engorda y venta de cerdos desde hace ya varios años. Ella explica que desde pequeña veía a sus vecinos de la comunidad que practicaban esta actividad y decidió que ella quería hacer lo mismo en el futuro. Lleva ya cuatro años con su negocio estable, Doña Ali dice que no es tarea difícil criar sus animalitos porque no requiere de mucho trabajo, le gusta tener sus animales porque de alguna manera son una fuente de ingresos. Los compra desde pequeños los cría y engorda aproximadamente en un periodo de cuatro a cinco meses durante este tiempo Doña Ali debe alimentar muy bien sus cerdos con maíz y otro tipo de alimento tres o cuatro veces al día, cuando ya tienen un peso considerable es cuando inicia a ofrecer sus cerdos. Ali ofrece sus animalitos a sus vecinos en ocasiones corre con suerte y las personas llegan a comprarle a su casa sin necesidad de estar buscando un comprador. De los cuatro años que lleva efectuado su actividad no ha tenido algún problema considerable sin embargo cuando llegan a enfermar y mueren los cerditos, estas son perdidas de inversión y ganancias. Para Doña Ali es algo muy normal siempre que sus pueqrquitos enferman, ella acude al veterinario para ver si hay alguna cura y es así como salva  a sus cerdos. Sin embargo, a pesar de esta dificultad no piensa dejar de criar sus cerdos porque aunque ya no tienen niños en la escuela su sueño es poder mejorar su vivienda con las ganancias obtenidas.
texts.en:
The "Orquídeas" ["Orchids"] group is in a calm community, the people of which work planting corn which feeds them year round. The members decided on this name because there was a pot with a striking, beautiful orchid at the house where they were meeting. The members of the group that are requesting loans are Celinda, who will invest in toys and novelties, Joaquín who will invest in the breeding and sale of sheep, Carmen and Regina who will invest in the rearing and sale of chickens, and Agustina and Ana Karen  who will invest in their grocery stores.

Alicia, or Ali, who is the representative of the group, is 57 years old, married to Gustavo, and together they form a family with three children. Ali has been breeding, fattening and selling pigs for several years. She explains that when she was little, she would watch her neighbors doing this activity, and she decided that she wanted to do the same in the future. With already 4 years of stable business, Ali says that it is not a difficult task raising her animals because they don't require much work. 

She likes to have animals because in some way they are a source of income. Ali buys them when they are little, and then raises and fattens them over a period of approximately four to five months. During this time, Ali must feed the pigs very well with corn, and another type of food three or four times a day. When they are already a considerable weight is when she starts to offer the pigs. She offers her animals to her neighbors occasionally when she gets lucky, and to people that come to her home to buy them without needing to search for a buyer.

Of the four years she has been conducting business, she has not had any considerable problem, but when her pigs become sick and die, these are losses of investments and earnings. For Ali, it's very normal that her little pigs always get sick. She goes to the vet to see if there is a cure, and this is how she saves her pigs. Nevertheless, despite this difficulty, she doesn't think to stop raising pigs because, even though she doesn't have children in school anymore, her dream is to be able to improve her home with her earnings.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario tiene 43 años esta divorciado y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en su casa construida con bloques de adobe. Desde muy niño le gustaba las labores en el campo y apoyaba con mucha dedicación a su familia quienes usaban la agricultura como su principal sustento ya que creció en el seno de una familia muy humilde.
Tras cumplir 19 años se independizó y recibió por parte de sus padres un terreno de 10 cuadras que empezó a cultivar en beneficio de su entonces nueva familia al lado de su esposa, no obstante se separó y desde entonces manteniente a su hogar de manera independiente. Hasta hoy posee 2 hectáreas repletas de cultivos tanto de cacao orgánico, café, barbasco y árboles frutales que cultiva con mucha dedicación por ser una labor que siempre le apasionó. A lo largo de su experiencia como agricultor a lidiado con distintos problemas tales como el ataque de plagas y condiciones adversas del clima que intentaron perjudicar su producción, no obstante siempre logra a través de su arduo trabajo contrarrestar estos factores mantenimiento al día el cuidado de sus plantaciones. Uno de sus principales objetivos a largos plazo es adquirir otro terreno para ampliar sus plantaciones de cacao ya que es uno de los productos más rentables de su zona esperando así mejorar sus ingresos en beneficio de sus hijos. Este es u primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo que recibe para seguir adelante,además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En esta oportunidad desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Mario is 43 years old and is divorced. He has two children,who he lives with in his house made from adobe bricks. From a very young age he liked working in the country and was very committed to supporting his family, who had little means and whose main livelihood came from farming.

When he was 19 years old he moved out of the family home and received a piece of land of around 15 acres which he began to cultivate to take care of his new family alongside his wife. However they separated, and since then he has supported the home alone. Today he has 2 hectares full of crops such as organic cocoa, coffee, barbasco plants and fruit trees which he grows with much dedication because it is a job he has always been passionate about. Over the years he has been a farmer he has dealt with different problems such as attacks by pests and adverse weather conditions which posed a risk to his crops. However, through hard work he always managed to counteract these factors and keep caring for his plantations up to the present.

One of his main long-term objectives is to acquire more land to increase his cocoa plantations as it is one of the most profitable products in the area, in the hope that he can increase his income, which will benefit his children. This is his first loan with Kiva and he is grateful for the help he receives to keep going. He also undertakes to make his repayments punctually. On this occasion he would like to borrow 2,000 PEN to buy organic manure.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Doris Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Doris vive en casa  propia  junto  a su  esposo y sus dos  hijos, ella es muy reconocida en la zona como una persona muy responsable  y trabajadora y además de ello posee un buen record crediticio,  ella se dedica a la elabora de productos lácteos, doña Doris solicita un  crédito para  capital de trabajo  y para poder comprar leche por mayor para realizar más productos y generar más ganancias y alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Doris lives in her own home with her spouse and their two children. She is well-known in her neighbourhood for being a very responsible and hard-working person. She also has a good credit history.

Doris works making dairy products. She is asking for a loan so that she can buy milk wholesale and acquire working capital. This will let her make more products, generate better earnings, and achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy milk wholesale.

loans.name: Uriel Enrique

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Uriel en su negocio de venta de ropa al por mayor y al detal, pues él con su anterior credikiva pudo comprar tela e jeans y fabricó pantalones. Su credikiva lo benefició porque incrementó su capital de trabajo sus ventas y sus utilidades en el negocio. Él dice a los financiadores de Kiva “Estoy muy agradecido con Kiva y con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, espero seguir contando con su apoyo. “ En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará una vez mas, al por mayor y de contado, telas y otros insumos, para fabricar jeans, pues es un mercado fijo y se acerca la temporada de alta demanda, para la cual Uriel debe preparase con inventarios, haciendo que esta sea muy exitosa.
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Uriel in his wholesale and retail price clothes sales business. With his previous Kiva loan he was able to buy cloth and jeans and he made trousers. His Kiva loan helped him to increase the working capital, sales and profits of his business. He says of Kiva investors: "I am very grateful to Kiva and the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, I hope they will continue to help me." 

He is currently applying for a Kiva loan, the first funding he applies for with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which he will again use to buy, at wholesale and cash prices, cloth and other supplies to make jeans, because this is a fixed market and the season of high demand is approaching. Uriel must get stock ready for this season, which will make it a very successful one.

loans.use: to buy, at wholesale or cash prices, cloth or other supplies to make jeans.

loans.name: Ugiloi

texts.ru: Угилой молодая, шустрая женщина. Ей 33 года,она замужем. Заботливая мама. У нее двое детей. Дети Угилоя еще маленькие. Муж Угилоя  уехал в Россию по работе. У Угилоя большая семья, они в данный момент проживают вместе с родителями и всегда во всем поддерживают друг  друга. Угилой с детства любила красивые вещи, и увлекалась модными одеждами. На сегодняшней день Угилой занялась торговлей одежды, для поддержания семейного бюджета. Не зря она выбрала именно эту сферу, ведь ей с детство нравились красивые вещи. Угилой с удовольствием каждый день идет на работу. С клиентами быстро находит общий язык. У нее много клиентов. Угилой хотела бы разнообразить ассортимент вещей. Но ей для этого нужно денежные средства. Для получения кредита она обратилась в "Арванд" в надежде что эта организация не откажет ей.
texts.en:
Ugiloi is a young woman who is always on top of things.  She is 33 years old, married, and the caring mother of two small children.  Ugilo's husband went away to work in Russia.  Ugiloi has a large family and, presently, she lives with her parents.  They always support one another in everything.  Since she was a child, Ugiloi has loved beautiful things and has been enamored by fasionable clothing.

Currently Ugiloi is in the business of selling clothes, in order to contribute to the family's income.  This type of business is a perfect fit since she has liked beautiful things since she was a child.   Every day, Ugiloi is excited to go to work.  She is able to quickly find a common language with her clients, of whom she has many.  

Ugiloi wants to expand her assortment of goods, but she needs funds with which to do this.  She has applied to MDO Arvand for a loan with the hope that this organization won't turn her down.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Glenda Yanira

texts.es: Glenda de 33 años de edad desde hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, perfumes, lociones, cremas, etc. posee mucha clientela porque sus productos son de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles comercializa en su lugar de residencia y también de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gasto del hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, Glenda está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor y poder surtir con mejor mercadería su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Glenda is 33 years old, and she has been selling beauty products, perfumes, lotions, and creams for 2 years. She has many clients because her products are high quality and inexpensive, and she sells them where she lives and by traveling through different communities. What she earns from her sales, helps with household expenses. Glenda lives in her own home with her husband and three children. She is requesting a loan to buy more wholesale products and to be able to stock her business with better merchandise to earn better income and to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale beauty products such as perfumes, lotions, creams, etc.

loans.name: Ream's Group

texts.en:
Ream is 34 years old and blessed with two children who are studying in a local state school. Her main source of income is from working as a paid worker in a local factory, while her husband works at a construction site to supplement the family’s income.  

This is the fourth loan for Ream with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid back her past loan wisely to improve her living better than before. For this loan cycle, she joins a group of three to seek a new loan with VisionFund. As a leader, she will spend her loan portion to build a decent latrine for her family. She hopes that she can own a proper latrine for her family to improve hygienic practices in her household.

loans.use: To build a decent latrine for her family.

loans.name: Melvin Yanira

texts.es: Melvin Yanira vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, desde hace varios años ella posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha cliente por la variedad de productos que comercializa y los buenos precios, Melvin Yanira está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como: granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, huevos, aceites, etc. y surtir aun mas su tienda para satisfacer a sus clientes cuando le lleguen a comprar y así obtener mejores ganancias y tener una mejor calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Melvin Yanira lives in her own house with her husband and three children.  She has had a store in her home for several years.  She has a lot of customers because of the variety of products she sells and her good prices.

Melvin Yanira's requesting a loan to buy more products such as staples, soda, sweets, eggs, oil, etc., so she can stock her store to satisfy her customers when they shop.  This way she'll earn better profits and have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to stock her store

loans.name: Bertha Lidia

texts.es:
Doña Bertha tiene 31 años de edad ella es ama de casa y agricultora la cual aprendió a muy temprana edad ya que en su familia es una tradición y una fuente de ingresos. Ella es madre de 3 hijos la mayor está en secundaria cursando el primero de bachillerato, la segunda esta en sexto grado de primaria y la menor de 7 años en tercer grado todas estudia en una institución de la comunidad. Doña Bertha tiene un grado de educación primario el cual curso hasta el quinto grado ya que la economía de sus padres en su juventud no era la mejor por lo que no pudieron apoyarla para que ella estudiara. La tierra que ella y su esposo trabajan es propia la cual está ubicada en un terreno que esta atrás de su casa de habitación por lo que el mantenimiento y limpieza es más fácil de dar ya que están al pendiente y cuidado del mismo.   

Sus planes a futuro son los de poder seguir comprando más tierra y seguir cultivándolo de café sembrando una mejor y mayor variedad como el caturra, catuay, que son más atractivos en el mercado. De esa manera ella podrá generar mayores ingresos para su familia y hogar y seguir apoyando a sus hijas en sus estudios para que puedan prepararse académicamente. Por los que hoy en día ella ha solicitado un financiamiento con el cual dará mantenimiento mediante la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono, foliares, formula cafetalera entre otros.
texts.en:
Bertha is 31 years old. She is a housewife and farmer, which she learned from a very early age, since in her family it is a tradition and a source of income. She is the mother of 3 children. The oldest daughter is in secondary school in her first year of a specialized course of study. The second daughter is in the sixth grade of primary school, and the youngest daughter, 7 years old, is in third grade. All of them study at an institution in the community. Bertha has a primary school education in which she studied through fifth grade, since her parents' financial situation in her youth was not the best and they could not support her so that she could study. The land that she and her husband work is their own. It is located on a plot that is behind the house where they live, so maintenance and cleaning are easier to perform, since they keep an eye on it and care for it.

Her plans in the future are to be able to continue buying more land and to continue growing coffee on it, planting a better and larger variety, such as Caturra and Catuai, which are more attractive in the market. In this way, she will be able to generate more income for her family and household, and she will be able to continue supporting her daughters in their studies so that they can prepare themselves academically. These reasons are why today she has requested a loan that she will use to perform maintenance by purchasing agricultural supplies such as manure, plant fertilizer, and coffee fertilizer, among others.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to care for her coffee crops

loans.name: Los Tellez Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres comerciantes emprendedores uno de ellos es María tiene 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre, tiene un hijo, su negocio es la venta de especie y cajetas ambulantes  desde hace 7 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 años, el crédito lo requiere para comprar especies al por mayor como achote, clavo de olor, pimienta, canela, y tambien materia prima para hacer  cajetas como azucar, rodamina, coyolitos, cocos, leche etc. Martha mujer de 32 años su negocio es la venta de granos básicos  y carne de res, Francisco hombre de 31 años su negocio es la venta de cajetas.
texts.en: The group is made up of three enterprising members.  One of them is Maria, who is 35 years old.  She lives in a common-law relationship and has one child.  She has been selling spices and candies as a mobile vendor for 7 years. She has been a client of the institution for 3 years.  She needs a loan to buy wholesale spices such as achiote, cloves, pepper and cinnamon, and also basic ingredients to make candies, such as sugar, rhodamine, coyolito fruit, coconut, milk, etc.  Martha is 32 years old, and her business is selling staple foods and beef.  Francisco is 31 years old, and his business is selling candies.

loans.use: to buy wholesale spices such as achiote, cloves, pepper and cinnamon, and also coconut candy, cinnamon candy, coyolito fruit, etc.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en: Mohammed is a 27-year-old married man who has a child. They live together in Sana`a, Yemen. He is a respectful and hardworking employee who gets a low salary. He has a strong determination to improve his standard of living. Due to the high cost of goods, the saved amount of his income is not enough to buy what he needs. He intends to buy furniture to use for his house. So, he has requested a loan of 140,000 YER (Yemen rials) to buy house furnishings like blankets, carpets, cushions, etc. In the future, he hopes to enroll his child in school and improve his living standards.

loans.use: to buy house furnishings like blankets, carpets, cushions, etc.

loans.name: Modesta

texts.es:
Modesta tiene 26 años, es madre soltera de un hijo que vive con ella en su casa construida a base de madera,
Cuando cumplió 19 años tuvo a su pequeño hijo y fue desde entonces su principal motivo de esfuerzo y trabajo al lado de su pareja, pero por problemas ajenos decidió independizarse convirtiéndose en el principal sustento de su hogar. Al ser una mujer muy trabajadora y abnegada se inició apoyando a sus padres en el campo cultivando alguno de los productos más rentables de su zona tales como el cacao orgánico entre otros.
Tras algunos años de trabajo reunió dinero suficiente para comprar su propia parcela apoyada por sus padres y que rápidamente le empezó a generarle ingresos para el sustento de su pequeña familia.
Posee actualmente una hectárea y media de terreno destinado a la producción de cacao, piñas y otros árboles frutales. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,500 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico para fertilizar sus plantaciones de cacao.
texts.en:
Modesta is 26 years old. She is the single mother of a son who lives with her in her house made of wood.

When she turned 19, she had her small son. From then on he was her main reason for effort and work alongside her partner, but due to other people's problems she decided to become independent, turning into the main support of her household. Since she is a very hard-working and self-sacrificing woman, she started helping her parents in the field, growing some of the most profitable produce in her area such as organic cacao, among others.

After some years of work she put together sufficient money to buy her own parcel, supported by her parents, which rapidly began to generate income for her to sustain her small family.

She currently has a hectare and a half of land for the production of cacao, pineapple, and other fruit trees. This is her first loan with Kiva, and she feels thankful for the financial support that she receives to move forward. She also promises to make her loan repayments in a punctual manner. At this time she would like 1,500 nuevos soles to buy organic fertilizer for her coffee crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Reina

texts.es:
Doña Reina de 47 años de edad es casada, madre de 4 hijos de los cuales 3 son personas estudiadas y profesionales, casados y en hogares a parte y un menor el cual está cursando el último año de educación secundaria. Ella en compañía de su esposo se han de dedicado a la agricultura por muchos años ya que es el único medio de ingreso económico para su familia y hogar que gracias a este rubro ella pudo sacar a sus hijos adelante y darles el apoyo necesario para que ellos pudiesen estudiar. La tierra que cultivan es propia gracias al esfuerzo por muchos años la cual pudieron comprar y ahora trabajar de manera propia las cuales están cultivadas de una gran variedad de café lo que le agradecen a DIOS por ese gran privilegio y oportunidad de tener a pesar de los diferentes desafíos que día con día enfrenta esta clase de producto.

Sus planes para el futuro son los de seguir ampliando más sus cultivos de café mediante la compra de tierra de esta manera ella fortalecerá el patrimonio para sus hijos y que sean ellos quienes sigan trabajándola de generación en generación y que sea de gran bendición. Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita un financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas para sus cultivos de café como abono, foliares, formula cafetalera, fungicidas, herbicidas, entre otros que darán protección a sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Reina is 47 years old and is married with 4 children, of whom 3 have completed their studies and are professionals, married and living outside the family home, and one of whom is in the final year of secondary school. 

Reina and her husband have made a living farming for many years and it is the only source of income for her family and home. Thanks to this line of work she has been able to help her children and give them the necessary support for them to study. 

They own the land they farm, as thanks to the efforts of many years they were able to buy it and now work on it themselves. They are growing many types of coffee, and they thank God for this great privilege and opportunity they have in spite of the various challenges this type of product faces every day.

Their plans for the future are to continue expanding their coffee crops through buying land and thereby increasing their assets for their children in the hope that they will continue working on it from generation to generation and that it will be a real blessing to them. This is why they are currently applying for a loan to buy farming supplies for coffee crops such as manure, plant fertilizers, coffee formula, fungicides and herbicides, amongst other things that will protect their crops.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Jahongir

texts.ru: Жахонгир молодой человек 23 лет. Он проживает в сельской местности. По природе Жахонгир спокойный, целеустремленный человек. Он никогда не останавливается на достигнутом. Всегда стремится вперед. Женат. Семья Жахонгира дружная. Жена Жахонгира Гулноза домохозяйка. Сам Жахонгир трудолюбивый человек. Как настоящий мужчина он добытчик семьи. Он занимается откормом и купли продажей скота. В этом ему помогает его жена Гулноза. Жахонгир еще параллельно работает на базе. Но основной доход от откорма скота. Жахангир  хотел бы  увеличить количество своих мелко рогатых скотов так как  у него дома большой участок земли чтобы откармливать мелко рогатый скот.  И чтоб эта территория не пустовала он решил расширить свой  бизнес, и обратился в организацию Арванд за помощью.  Жахангир надеется что  " Арванд" поддержит его   и с большим удовольствием поможет Жахонгиру в осуществление его дела.
texts.en:
Jahongir is a young man of 23 years.  He lives with in a rural area.  By his nature, Jahongir is a calm and goal-oriented person.  He never rests on his laurels and is always striving to keep moving forward.  He is married and has a loving family.  Gulnoza, Jahongir's wife, is a homemaker.  Jahongir is a hard worker, and like a real man, he is the family's breadwinner.  He is in the business of trading and fattening cattle.  His wife helps him with the business.  He has a second job, but his primary income is from fattening cattle.  

Jahongir would like to increase the size of his herd of sheep and goats, because he has a large piece of land where he can pasture them.  Not wanting this piece of land to sit idle, he decided to expand his business and applied to MDO Arvand for a loan.  Jahongir hopes that MDO Arvand will support him and enthusiastically help him in the expanding his business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Faisal

texts.en:
Faisal is a 19-year-old single young man. He lives in Ibb, Yemen. He is a hardworking soldier who has been living through difficult situations with his family. He loves this career because he is able to protect his homeland in a human way. He says his salary is not enough to buy what he needs. 

So he has applied for a youth loan of 60,000 YER from AMB to buy a mobile phone in order to communicate with people. He hopes to offer a good life in order to get married and open a retail shop. Faisal, who appears on the photo, bought his mobile from a phone-accessories shop.

loans.use: to buy a mobile phone in order to communicate with people.

loans.name: Khalid

texts.en:
Khalid is 29 years old. He is a married man and has one child and they live in Sana`a, Yemen. He owns a small call center where he offers good services for communication. He started his business with a small amount of money. He faces challenges in his business including that he is not able to offer more services to his clients. 

He is going to use the loan to expand his business in order to continue improving his business and in that way to continue generating more income with the goal of improving his quality of life. So he applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to enable him to buy printers, telephone cabins and telephones etc. to expand his business. 

He feels happy and thankful for the opportunity that has been offered to him since this is the only work that allows him to support himself.

loans.use: to buy printers, telephone cabins and telephones to expand his business.

loans.name: Martha De Los Angeles

texts.es: La señora Martha habitante de la comarca llamada Veracruz, tiene la edad de 38 años, casada madre de dos hijos que tienen las edades de 8 y 5 años, asisten a la escuela, su esposo trabaja por cuenta propia como maestro de obra (albañil) ella tiene un puesto de venta de comida, realiza fritangas por las noches y los viernes elabora Nacatamales para venderlos el fin de semana. el credito lo solicita para la compra de Abarrotes como arroz, aceite, carnes, platanos, ademas comprara vegetales para la elaboracion de nacatamales. agradece el apoyo brindado por parte de Kiva y Afodenic ya que con este financiamiento sus ingresos aumentaran y sus condiciones de vida mejoraran.
texts.en:
Martha lives in the district called Veracruz. She is 38 years old, married, and the mother of two children, ages 8 and 5. They go to school and her husband is self-employed as a construction foreman. She has a food stall and makes fritanga (fried foods) in the evenings and on Fridays makes nacatamales (Nicaraguan stuffed tamales) to sell on the weekend. 

She is applying for the loan to buy supplies such as rice, cooking oil, meats and plantains. She will also buy vegetables for making nacatamales.  She is grateful for the support offered by Kiva and Afodenic.  With this financing, her income will increase and her living conditions will improve.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as chicken, meat, rice etc.

loans.name: Odilio

texts.es:
Odilio tiene 35 años, está casado y vive junto a sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Odilio creció en el campo y siempre estuvo ligado a los terrenos de cultivo donde aprendió a usar la agricultura como principal sustento económico desempeñándolo desde niño junto a sus hermanos siguiendo así una tradición familiar. Al cumplir 21 años recibió por parte de sus padres un terreno de 1 hectárea donde empezó a cultivar varios árboles de cacao orgánico, piñas, entre otros. Uno de los principales inconvenientes que afronto al inicio de sus labores fue que el precio de las mazorcas secas presentaron una disminución en los precios por parte de los acopiadores perjudicando así sus ganancias ya que realizó una inversión considerable por tratarse de su primera campaña productiva corriendo el riesgo de fracasar, no obstante con mucha dedicación y esfuerzo logró salir adelante.
Este es su primer crédito con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está ocasión desea contar con 2,000 nuevo soles para la compra de abono orgánico y así nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en: Odilio is 35 years old.  He is married and lives with his 2 children in his own house.  Odilio grew up in the country and has always been connected to the land.  As a child, he learned along with his siblings to follow the family tradition of supporting themselves through agriculture.  At the age of 21 he received a 1-hectare plot of land from his parents. There he began to grow organic cocoa trees and pineapples, among other things.  One of the main problems that he faced when starting out was a reduction in the price of dried corn due to people buying up quantities to keep them off the market. This put his earnings at risk, as he had made a considerable investment with respect to his first crop, and he was at risk of failure.However, with great dedication and effort he succeeded in making progress.  This is his first loan with Kiva.  He is grateful for the financial support in order to continue moving forward, and promises to make his monthly payments punctually. He would like to have 2,000 nuevo soles to buy organic manure to feed his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan desea adquirir al crédito un pequeño sistema solar  para tener iluminación  limpia  en su hogar.Actualmente el y su esposa se iluminan con candiles, lo cual no les gusta por el excesivo humo.Juan desde la edad de 14 años se traslado a vivir con sus padres la una comunidad de la tuma,por asuntos económicos el llego solamente a segundo grado de primaria , desde entonces el se a dedicado a los trabajos de campo como es la ordeña de ganado y sembrar frijoles.
texts.en: Juan wants to take out a loan for a small solar power system so he can have solar light energy in his home. Currently he and his wife use candles for light, which they don't like because it produces a lot of smoke. At the age of 14 Juan went to live with his parents in a town in Tuma. For financial reasons he only reached second grade of primary school. Since then he has held jobs in the fields such as milking cattle and sowing beans.

loans.use: to buy a solar power system so he can have clean energy in his home.

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru:
Саодат очень трудолюбивый человек, любит заниматься собственным бизнесом и развивать его. Она родилась в 1977 году в городе Канибадаме . Замужем, имеет 3-х детей. Саодат является клиентом Арванд с 2011 года. Она очень пунктуальный и добросовестный человек. Во время кредитования не имела ни одной просрочки. Ее вид деятельности заключается в том что она занимается   купли-продажей продуктов питания и сладостей. Продукты питания она продает на центральном рынке своего города. 
В очередной раз Саодат обратилась в организацию Арванд за кредитом. Она хочет расширить свой ассортимент товара. Саодат  на полученный кредит планирует закупить продуктов питания. Саодат выражает благодарность организации Арванд за сотрудничество и за содействие в реализации ее планов.
texts.en:
Saodat is a very hardworking person and she loves running and developing her own business.  She was born in 1977 in Kanibadam.  She is married and has three children.  Saodat has been a client of MDO Arvand since 2011. She is a very punctual and conscientious person.  Over the course of her loans, she hasn't missed a single payment.  Her business type is selling food products and sweets, which she sells in her city's central market.  

Saodat has again applied to MDO Arvand for a loan.  She wants to expand the assortment of foods that she carries.  Saodat plans to use the loan funds to buy food products.  Saodat would like to express her gratitude to MDO Arvand for its cooperation and assistance in bringing her plans to life.

loans.use: to buy food

loans.name: Leonidas Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios trabajadores y emprendedores  uno de ellos es Jeovany tiene 37 años de edad, casado, con dos hijos, su negocio es albañilería y comerciante de pollo en piezas, enteros desde hace un 1 año, el crédito lo requiere para la compra al por mayor de carne de pollo en piezas, enteros, piernas, muslos, pechugas etc. Fátima mujer de 34 años de edad su negocio es la venta de verduras y Narcisa mujer de 48 años su negocio es la venta de productos varios y atolillo.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hard-working and entrepreneurial members. One of them is Jeovany who is 37 years old, married, and has two children. His businesses are masonry and selling chicken, in pieces and whole, since one year back. He is requesting this loan in order to buy wholesale chicken in pieces, whole, legs, drumsticks, breasts, etc. 

Fátima is a 34-year-old woman and her business is selling vegetables. Narcisa is a 48-year-old woman and her business is to sell miscellaneous products and custard.

loans.use: to buy wholesale chicken such as whole chickens, chicken in pieces, legs, drumsticks, breasts, etc

loans.name: Savoeurn's Group

texts.en:
Savoeurn is 53 years old and a mother of two children. To make a living, she grows rice on half hectare area as the main source of income. She has been doing this for 10 years, earning about 38,000 KHR per day. 

Savoeurn and other two borrowers have been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for at least four cycles and have paid back the previous loans with success. For Savoeurn, the past loans have enabled her to improve her lifestyle so it is better than before.  

Now she and one of her co-borrowers are seeking 1,000,000 KHR each while a remaining borrower is applying for 800,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizers for her crops. Additionally, she will spend her loan portion to buy piglets to raise in order to have extra income. She hopes she can make more income from her business so that she can expand her animal husbandry and make it larger than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her crops.

loans.name: Khom

texts.en:
Khom is 61 years old and a married mother of seven children. To cover the daily cost of living, she does rice farming on one hectare and weaves silk on one loom. It is the business that she has had for 10 years. 

Khom has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for ages, over seven cycles, and she has fully repaid back her loans with success. The past loans have enabled her to improve her living so it is better than before. Moreover, she managed to set aside some money to buy a decent motorbike for her family. 

Now, she is seeking for an education loan in order to pay tuition fees and purchase school materials for her son who wants to pursue a bachelor's degree in Finance and Banking. She hopes this support will enable her to be less worried about the financial burdens which she used to have and will allow her son to obtain a good study record and get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: To pay tuition fees and purchase school materials for her son.

loans.name: Ratana

texts.en:
Ratana is a young man in his early twenties residing in Takeo province. To strive for a living, he worked as a paid worker in Thailand for six months. However he has quit his job and moved back to his homeland where he farms rice as his main source of income. 

Ratana wants to hold a bachelor degree in English Literature. Therefore, he has applied for an education loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) to pay the tuition fees for his studies so that he can fulfill his dream. He hopes that this financial support will fulfill his dream of getting an academic background and that he will get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: To pay the tuition fees for his bachelor degree.

loans.name: Eka's Group

texts.en:
Eka is a young mother of one little daughter living in Sampov Meas district of Pursat province. To cover the cost of daily food consumption, she runs a small grocery stall which is her core income-generating business. She has been involved in the current business for just two years, earning about 20,000 KHR per day. 

This is the first microloan for Eka’s group with VisionFund (Kiva's partner). The group, composed of three members, are seeking the same loan amount of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy more grocery items including canned food, instant noodles, food ingredients etc. for resale. She hopes this purchase will replenish her business in a timely manner and triple her income so that she can expand her business so it is larger than before.

loans.use: To buy more grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Chhean's Group

texts.en:
